CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 21, 1945, pg. 26 reads: "Nuptials - Charming gathering at the wedding of the former Florence Williams and W. James Adams. The ceremony was performed at the home of the bride's parents, Mr. and Mrs. J. V. Williams, 2429 Waring Court, Terrace Village II.  Left to right :Jack Cooper, the groom, W. James Adams; the bride, Florence Williams; maid of honor, Mrs. Lou Williams; J. V. Williams, brother of the bride. - Harris Photo."Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 28, 1945, pg. 10, reads: "Newlyweds - Pictured are Mr. and Mrs. James Adams, who were married recently at the home of the bride's brother and sister-in-law, Mr. and Mrs. J. V. Williams, 2429 Waring Court, Terrace Village II. The bride is the former Florence Williams. Left to right: Jack Cooper, bridal pair, Mrs. Lou Williams, maid of honor, and J. V. Williams, brother of the bride. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Williams - Adams wedding party, from left: Jack Cooper, groom W. James Adams, bride Florence Williams Adams, maid of honor,Mrs. Lou Williams, and J. V. Williams, posed in front of curtain in home of J. V. Williams, 2429 Waring Court, Terrace Village II
